title: Avalanche Ecosystem Gets an Upgrade with Arkefi: AllianceBlock-Powered Art, Cars, and Exclusive Collectible Investment Platform
description: Zurich, Switzerland, September 7th, 2023, Chainwire The world of investing in art and exclusive collectibles is undergoing significant change with Web3 technology and DeFi. Well-known decentralized tokenized markets’ infrastructure provider AllianceBlock introduces the high-value real-world asset (RWA) investment platform Arkefi in the Avalanche ecosystem. Backed by reputed art investment company ARTBANX, Arkefi’s unique approach aims ... Read more

title: Cybersecurity Alert:CybeReady Launches AI-Driven Training Toolkits
description: In a bold move against emerging digital threats driven by cutting-edge AI tools in the hands of cybercriminals, CybeReady, a prominent global leader in security awareness training, is making waves. title: ChatGPT Says Borroe.Finance, Stellar ($XLM) and AAVE Are the Best Altcoins In 2023
description: After a tumultuous past few weeks, Borroe.Finance ($ROE), Stellar ($XLM), and $AAVE have emerged as top altcoins of 2023. Some analysts believe $XLM’s new global payment service will push it to new heights. $AAVE is already pulling off an impressive recovery despite falling to the red zone on August 17. Elsewhere, $ROE is stealing headlines [...]

title: Arkefi Launches Groundbreaking RWA Investment Platform in the Avalanche Ecosystem
description: Arkefi and AllianceBlock collaborate to revolutionize RWA investments in art and collectibles using blockchain and DeFi. Arkefi’s user-friendly platform makes investing in high-value assets accessible, starting at just $100. In a bold stride towards democratizing high-value real-world asset (RWA) investments, Arkefi, the brainchild of AllianceBlock, has emerged as a game-changer in the world of art [...]

title: Report: Billion Dollar Ripple (XRP) and ODL User SBI Holdings Responsible for Meteoric Rise and Price Explosion of Shiba Inu (SHIB)
description: On-chain researcher BoringSlueth how Japanese financial conglomerate SBI Holdings is behind Shiba Inu’s meteoric rise. He also added that the group dumped SHIB holdings on retail investors while creating a hype around it. Japan’s financial conglomerate SBI Holdings, also a key partner of blockchain startup Ripple, has been reportedly behind the meteoric rise of memecoin [...]

title: Stagnant Bitcoin Price Hinting at Incoming Market Turbulence, Says Bloomberg Strategist – Here’s What He Means
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence senior macro strategist Mike McGlone thinks Bitcoin’s (BTC) recent price action indicates economic turbulence is ahead. McGlone tells his 60,000 followers on the social media platform X that Bitcoin is showing bearish divergence against the Nasdaq 100 Stock Index, which may indicate a coming recession. “Is one of the best-performing assets ever telling […]
